description:
A kappa becomes friends with a boy.  A centipede goes to et a doctor.  A rich man is transformed into a monkey.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oise no Kappa / Mukade no Isha Mukae / Saru ni Natta Kanemochi
The Kappa of Ise / The Centipede Gets a Doctor / The Rich Man Who Became a Monkey
おいせのかっぱ / ムカデの医者むかえ / サルになった金もち
